Title: Solving Mendelian Mysteries: The Non-coding Genome May Hold the Key
Abstract: © 2018 Elsevier Inc.Despite revolutionary advances in sequencing approaches, many mendelian disorders have remained unexplained. In this issue of Cell, Aneichyk et al. combine genomic and cell-type-specific transcriptomic data to causally link a non-coding mutation in the ubiquitous TAF1 gene to X-linked dystonia-parkinsonism.
